ðŸ“– Summary: SSHM is a command-line SSH manager written in Go that provides a TUI for managing and connecting to SSH hosts. It simplifies SSH connection management with features like port forwarding, tag support, smart search, and real-time status updates, aiming to make the process more efficient and user-friendly.
